Title: Monsoon Mangoes
Writer: Naveen Bhaskar, Matt Grubb, Abi Varghese
Actors: Fahadh Faasil, Vijay Raaz, Vinay Forrt, Iswarya Menon
Plot: D.P Pallickal, an amateur film maker who claims he is the next film legend. D.P has great passion, but lacks talent. His family and friends constantly make fun of his amateurishness of his masterpiece short films.
